# Next.js Migration Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Migrating React parcel tracking website to Next.js 14 with App Router.

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Get Next.js project setup info
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project structure
- [ ] Migrate components and pages
- [ ] Migrate assets and public files
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Create and run build task
- [ ] Verify project works

## Current Step
Setting up Next.js project structure for migration from Create React App.
